tasks.title: Project Setup with Next.js 15
tasks.description: Initialize the project with Next.js 15 framework, configure Tailwind CSS with dark mode default, and set up the basic file structure.
tasks.details:
1. Create a new Next.js 15 project using `npx create-next-app@latest keryk-ai-agent-sandbox`
2. Configure Tailwind CSS with dark mode as default
3. Set up the file structure according to the PRD
4. Install required dependencies from package.json
5. Configure environment variables
6. Set up basic routing structure
7. Create placeholder components
8. Configure dark mode theme with the specified color palette
```css
--background: #0a0a0a
--foreground: #ffffff
--card: #1a1a1a
--card-hover: #2a2a2a
--primary: #3b82f6
--primary-hover: #2563eb
--text-muted: #a1a1aa
--border: #27272a
```
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project structure matches PRD requirements. Run the application locally to ensure it builds without errors. Confirm dark mode is working as the default theme. Validate that all required dependencies are installed correctly.

tasks.title: Firebase Authentication Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Firebase Authentication to support email/password login and anonymous access for test agents.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration, login with email/password, and anonymous access. Verify that the `sandbox_access` flag correctly restricts access to permitted agents. Test authentication persistence across page refreshes. Ensure protected routes redirect unauthenticated users appropriately.

tasks.title: Firebase Firestore Integration for Agent Data
tasks.description: Set up Firestore database connection to fetch agent data from the Curator database with real-time updates.
tasks.testStrategy: Test fetching agents from Firestore with both authenticated and anonymous users. Verify real-time updates work when agent data changes. Test search and filtering functionality. Ensure error handling works correctly when database is unavailable.

tasks.title: Landing Page and Agent Selection UI
tasks.description: Create the landing page with agent selection UI, including grid/list view, search functionality, and agent cards.
tasks.testStrategy: Test responsive layout on various screen sizes. Verify search and filtering functionality works correctly. Test loading states and transitions. Ensure touch targets meet the 44px minimum requirement. Verify agent cards display all required information correctly.

tasks.title: Chat Interface Layout and Routing
tasks.description: Create the chat interface layout and implement routing between agent selection and chat pages.
tasks.testStrategy: Test navigation between agent selection and chat pages. Verify dynamic routing works with different agent IDs. Test responsive layout on various screen sizes. Ensure mobile keyboard handling works correctly. Verify back button functionality.

tasks.title: Text Chat Message Component
tasks.description: Implement the text chat message component with message bubbles, typing indicators, and auto-scroll functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test message rendering with various content lengths. Verify auto-scroll functionality works with new messages. Test typing indicator appearance and animation. Ensure copy functionality works on long-press. Test on various screen sizes to verify responsive behavior.

tasks.title: Text Chat Input Component
tasks.description: Create the text input component for sending messages with proper mobile keyboard handling.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Test input submission with various message lengths
2. Verify form clears after submission and focus remains in the textarea
3. Test disabled state when agent is processing
4. Ensure mobile keyboard appears and dismisses correctly
5. Verify touch targets meet the 48px minimum requirement
6. Test auto-resizing functionality with different content lengths
7. Verify Enter sends message while Shift+Enter creates a new line
8. Test character limit functionality and visual indicator
9. Ensure smooth animations and transitions work as expected
10. Test autoFocus prop functionality

tasks.title: Agent Integration for Text Chat
tasks.description: Implement the integration with the StandardizedAgent API for text-based conversations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test sending and receiving messages with the agent API. Verify typing indicators work correctly. Test error handling with simulated API failures. Test offline message queuing and sending when back online. Verify message state updates correctly throughout the process. Test retry functionality for failed messages. Test request cancellation. Verify TextChatInterface components display correct status indicators. Test session management in agentService.

subtasks.title: Create useAgentChat hook
subtasks.description: Implement hook for message handling with agent API, including online/offline detection, message status tracking, retry logic, typing indicators, and request cancellation.

subtasks.title: Create agentService
subtasks.description: Implement service for session management, message sending with error handling, metadata support, and session tracking/statistics.

subtasks.title: Create TextChatInterface component
subtasks.description: Implement component that combines TextChat for message display, TextChatInput for message input, status indicators, and integration with useAgentChat hook.

subtasks.title: Write unit tests for useAgentChat hook
subtasks.description: Test message sending/receiving, offline queue, retry logic, and request cancellation.

subtasks.title: Write unit tests for agentService
subtasks.description: Test session management, error handling, and metadata support.

subtasks.title: Write integration tests for TextChatInterface
subtasks.description: Test the complete flow from user input to message display with various states (online/offline, success/failure).

tasks.title: Voice Chat UI Components
tasks.description: Create the voice chat UI components with visual feedback for voice activity.
tasks.testStrategy: Test visual feedback components in different states (listening, speaking, idle). Verify animations work correctly. Test responsive layout on various screen sizes. Ensure transcript and agent message displays update correctly.

tasks.title: OpenAI Realtime API Integration
tasks.description: Implement the integration with OpenAI's Realtime API for voice conversations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test audio permission requests and handling. Verify WebSocket connection to OpenAI Realtime API. Test voice activity detection. Verify continuous listening mode works correctly. Test interruption support during conversation. Ensure error handling works for various failure scenarios.

tasks.title: Mode Toggle Component
tasks.description: Create a component to toggle between text and voice chat modes with smooth transitions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test mode switching between text and voice. Verify visual indicators update correctly. Test disabled state. Ensure touch targets meet the 44px minimum requirement. Verify component only shows supported modes.

tasks.title: Main Chat Interface Component
tasks.description: Create the main chat interface component that combines text and voice chat functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test integration of text and voice components. Verify mode switching works correctly. Test agent information display. Ensure back button navigation works. Test initialization for both text and voice modes. Verify error handling for both modes.

tasks.title: API Routes for Agent Communication
tasks.description: Create API routes for agent communication, including agent listing and message handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test agent listing API with authenticated and anonymous users. Verify message handling API correctly processes requests. Test authentication middleware. Verify rate limiting works correctly. Test error handling with various error scenarios. Ensure CORS is properly configured.

tasks.title: Mobile Optimizations
tasks.description: Implement mobile-specific optimizations for touch interactions, keyboard handling, and viewport management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on various mobile devices to verify touch interactions work correctly. Test virtual keyboard appearance and dismissal. Verify swipe gestures for mode switching. Ensure double-tap zoom prevention works. Test tap response times for touch interactions.

tasks.title: Performance Optimizations
tasks.description: Implement performance optimizations for fast loading and smooth interactions.
tasks.testStrategy: Measure page load times before and after optimizations. Test on low-end devices to verify performance improvements. Verify lazy loading works correctly for images. Test virtual scrolling with large agent lists. Measure bundle size before and after optimizations.

tasks.title: Error Handling and Fallbacks
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling and fallback UI components.
tasks.testStrategy: Test error boundary with simulated component errors. Verify fallback UI appears correctly for API failures. Test retry mechanisms for failed requests. Verify toast notifications appear and disappear correctly. Test offline detection by toggling network connection.

tasks.title: Loading States and Skeleton Screens
tasks.description: Implement loading states and skeleton screens for a better user experience during data fetching.
tasks.testStrategy: Test skeleton loaders with simulated loading states. Verify loading indicators appear during data fetching. Test transition animations between states. Ensure loading states provide a good user experience on slow connections.

tasks.title: Deployment Configuration
tasks.description: Configure deployment settings for Vercel or similar CDN hosting.
tasks.testStrategy: Test deployment to staging environment. Verify environment variables are correctly set. Test custom domain configuration. Verify caching policies work correctly. Test CI/CD pipeline with sample changes. Verify monitoring and analytics are working.

tasks.title: Progressive Web App Configuration
tasks.description: Configure the application as a Progressive Web App (PWA) for better mobile experience.
tasks.testStrategy: Test PWA installation on various devices. Verify offline functionality works correctly. Test app icons and splash screens on different devices. Verify install prompts appear correctly. Test offline fallback pages when network is unavailable.
